column1: * 1915 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes You and Me / and the Cottage of Lost Play.
* 1932 - Voice actor Casey Kasem is born.
** Thorin and Company and Gandalf arrive at Bag End. Bilbo Baggins learns of the Lonely Mountain and Smaug and agrees to accompany the Thorin and Company and Gandalf on their adventure.
